351430.name: Hand of Fate Original Soundtrack
351430.description:
This is the official soundtrack for "Hand of Fate", a game by Defiant Development. In this game, deck building comes to life. Collect cards, then fight against them when they transform into an exciting 3D battle arena.

credits

released 25 February 2015

Composed, engineered, and produced by Jeff van Dyck.
"Hand of Fate" vocals and lyrics by Angela van Dyck.
Guitars by Shaun Trainer.
351430.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
